intro: Hi, and welcome to my professional space. I'm a Software Engineer specializing in web and mobile application development. My technical foundation, built during my MSc at Aalto University, is now focused on advancing high-scale digital solutions at Veikkaus. This portfolio offers a snapshot of my skills, and how I approach complex engineering challenges in software development. For a quick dive into my experience, feel free to check out my resume. If you're interested in collaborating or just want to connect, scroll down to the contact section. Thank you for stopping by â€” I'm always open to new opportunities.
shortIntro: Passionate about Full Stack development, building high-performance, maintainable and user-friendly applications for mobile and web
